name: Litany of Escape
target: one willing creature that is grappled
text: With a powerful prayer, you call upon the servants of your god to whisk a friend out of a grapple. The target loses the grappled and pinned conditions and is teleported 10 feet. If there is no available space for the target to teleport to, the spell fails.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 法器
target_zh: 一个被擒抱中的自愿生物
text_zh:
随着一次强力的祈祷，你呼唤出你的神的仆人助你的盟友脱离擒抱。

目标立刻脱离擒抱和攫取，并且传送10尺远。
